## Context.getGlContext() method

Returns the WebGL2RenderingContext of the canvas element it's tied to once available.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getGlContext(): Promise<WebGL2RenderingContext>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;WebGL2RenderingContext&gt;

The WebGL2RenderingContext
